schemas.name: main.graphql
schemas.content:
# import Venue from './venue.graphql'
# import Event from './event.graphql'
# import Artist from './artist.graphql'
# import Location from './location.graphql'

type Query {
  venues(query: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): [Venue],
  venue(venueId: Int): Venue,
  event(event_id: Int): Event,
  events(
    artist_name: String,
    location: String,
    type: String,
    artist_id: Int,
    music_brainz_id: Int,
    venue_id: Int,
    metro_area_id: Int,
    username: String,
    reason: String,
    min_date: String,
    max_date: String,
    page: Int,
    per_page: Int,
    order: String
  ): [Event],
  artists(query: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): [Artist],
  similarArtists(artistId: Int): [Artist],
  locationSearch(query: String, location: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): Location
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/main.graphql:
# import Venue from './venue.graphql'
# import Event from './event.graphql'
# import Artist from './artist.graphql'
# import Location from './location.graphql'

type Query {
  venues(query: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): [Venue],
  venue(venueId: Int): Venue,
  event(event_id: Int): Event,
  events(
    artist_name: String,
    location: String,
    type: String,
    artist_id: Int,
    music_brainz_id: Int,
    venue_id: Int,
    metro_area_id: Int,
    username: String,
    reason: String,
    min_date: String,
    max_date: String,
    page: Int,
    per_page: Int,
    order: String
  ): [Event],
  artists(query: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): [Artist],
  similarArtists(artistId: Int): [Artist],
  locationSearch(query: String, location: String, page: Int, per_page: Int): Location
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/venue.graphql:
# import City from './city.graphql'
# import MetroArea from './metro-area.graphql'
# import Event from './event.graphql'

type Venue {
  id: Int,
  displayName: String,
  uri: String,
  city: City,
  lat: Float,
  lng: Float,
  street: String,
  zip: String,
  phone: String,
  website: String,
  capacity: Int,
  description: String,
  metroArea: MetroArea,
  events(per_page: Int): [Event]
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/event.graphql:
# import Start from './start.graphql'
# import End from './end.graphql'
# import Performance from './performance.graphql'
# import Location from './location.graphql'
# import Venue from './venue.graphql'

type Event {
  id: Int,
  type: String,
  uri: String,
  displayName: String,
  start: Start,
  end: End,
  performance: [Performance],
  location: Location,
  venue: Venue,
  status: String,
  ageRestriction: String
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/artist.graphql:
# import Identifier from './identifier.graphql'
# import Event from './event.graphql'

type Artist {
  uri: String,
  displayName: String,
  id: Int,
  onTourUntil: String,
  identifier: [Identifier],
  events(per_page: Int): [Event]
  similarArtists(artistId: Int): [Artist]
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/location.graphql:
type Location {
  city: String,
  lng: Float,
  lat: Float
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/city.graphql:
# import Country from './country.graphql'

type City {
  id: Int,
  uri: String,
  displayName: String,
  country: Country
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/metro-area.graphql:
# import Country from './country.graphql'

type MetroArea {
  id: Int,
  uri: String,
  displayName: String,
  country: Country
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/start.graphql:
type Start {
  time: String,
  date: String,
  datetime: String
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/end.graphql:
type End {
  time: String,
  date: String,
  datetime: String
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/performance.graphql:
# import Artist from './artist.graphql'

type Performance {
  artist: Artist,
  displayName: String,
  billingIndex: Int,
  id: Int,
  billing: String
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/identifier.graphql:
type Identifier {
  href: String,
  mbid: String,
  eventsHref: String
}

# https://github.com/Seb-L/songkick-graphql/blob/c4b53dd8c27316701940b423ecbeb02ebe244273/src/schemas/country.graphql:
type Country {
  displayName: String
}
